## SimpleRaycastCollider.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `SimpleRaycastCollider` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(moveTarget: THREE.Object3D, getObjects: () => THREE.Object3D[] | undefined, options?: {
        isDebug?: boolean;
        intervalSec?: number;
    });
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  moveTarget | THREE.Object3D | Objects to move. |
|  getObjects | () =&gt; THREE.Object3D\[\] \| undefined | Get a list of collidable objects. |
|  options | { isDebug?: boolean; intervalSec?: number; } | _(Optional)_ Processing frequency of tick(). Default is 1 / 30 (30fps). |
